name: Smart Disable Right Click On Website
author: SmartSoftFirm

sections.description:
How do I make my website right-click disabled?
This plugin can do that easy way to enable/Disable the right-click menu on your webpage by using a simple one-click button. Visitor can’t click right click to inspect element.

Features

  • disable right-click on website
  • disable inspect element
  • right-click disabled
  • disable right-click menu

NEED HELP?

Is there any feature that you want to get in this plugin?
Needs assistance to use this plugin?
Feel free to Contact us
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Just install and active you will get a admin menu option “Smart Disable Right Click in Settings Menu”.
  4. Click Enable and save to Disable right-click on your website.
  5. you can also enable right click click unmark and save.
sections.faq:
Does it work with any webpages?

Yes. I will work all of your webpages.

Does it work with any theme?

Yes. it will work with any WordPress Theme
